property.name: numberOfSteps
property.label: Number of steps
property.description: The total number of steps in the process.

property.name: percentageComplete
property.label: Percentage complete
property.description: Optional percentage complete (0-100). If provided, overrides the step-based calculation.

property.name: showBackButton
property.label: Show back button
property.description: When true, displays a back button when current step is greater than 1.

property.name: backButtonUrl
property.label: Back button URL
property.description: Optional URL for the back button. If not provided, uses browser history.

property.name: language
property.label: Language
property.description: The language for the step indicator: en or fr.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
